module.name: ap210_laminate_assembly_design
module.keywords: module, laminate assembly, interconnect substrate, electrical, optical, sequential lamination

abstract.p: the representation of laminate assembly design. This data provides information sufficient to allow communication of the relative vertical arrangement of laminates in an interconnect product, and required interconnections among the materials assembled. Vertical assembly structure that varies over the x y plane of the substrate is supported. The geometric pattern design details to be applied to a laminate are not covered in this part of ISO 10303. Configuration management information and design change management information is provided. This module does not provide for the description of the cloth that forms many dielectric materials used in laminates.
abstract.li: sequence of application of an embedded component;
sequence of material buildup or lamination;

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of laminate assembly design. This data provides information sufficient to allow communication of the relative vertical arrangement of laminates in an interconnect product, and required interconnections among the materials assembled. Vertical assembly structure that varies over the x y plane of the substrate is supported. The geometric pattern design details to be applied to a laminate are not covered in this part of ISO 10303. Configuration management information and design change management information is provided. This module does not provide for the description of the cloth that forms many dielectric materials used in laminates.

inscope.li: sequence of application of an embedded component;
sequence of material buildup or lamination;
items within the scope of application module Design product data management, ISO/TS 10303-1628;
items within the scope of application module Sequential laminate assembly design, ISO/TS 10303-1741.

outscope.li: detailed definition of a particular laminate assembly process;
detailed definition of a particular composition of a composite material.
